name: Little Pumpkin
description:
Hey there! Last few weeks I was in a creative mood and I've built a Halloween-themed mini-game.

Lore

You play as a cute witch, who went to a forest in the need of few missing ingredients. Those ingredients is the last thing to finish the protective potion from evil spirits. Unfortunately, the witch isn't in a good relations with the guardians of the sacred forest and she need to hurry up before they notice her.

Your goal as a player is to collect as many enchanted pumpkins as you can in just one minute. Better the final score is - better the potion will protect.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse to look

Space to jump
